info.name: barnard59-core
info.description: Core component of Barnard59 Linked Data pipelines

operations.label: Read file
operations.comment: Reads a file from the local file system.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <undefined>
].

operations.label: Write file
operations.comment: Writes a file to the local file system.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <undefined>
].
